user-question: 작업 환경 문제로 인해 근로자가 직업병을 앓게 된 경우 법적 보상 기준은 무엇인가요?
assistant-response: 한국에서 작업 환경 문제로 인해 직업병을 앓게 된 근로자는 산업재해보상보험법에 따라 보상을 받을 수 있습니다. 직업병이 인정되면 요양급여, 휴업급여, 장해급여 등의 보상을 받을 수 있습니다. 직업병이란 근로자가 업무 수행 중 노출된 유해 물질이나 환경적 요인으로 인해 발생한 질병을 말합니다. 이를 인정받기 위해서는 업무와 질병 간의 인과관계가 입증되어야 하며, 근로복지공단에 신청하여 심사를 받아야 합니다. 2024년의 최저 임금은 시간당 10,000원으로, 이는 초과 근무나 야간 근무 시 가산 임금 산정에 영향을 미칩니다. 직업병 보상 신청과 관련하여 도움을 받을 수 있는 기관은 근로복지공단입니다. 외국인 노동자나 이민자는 외국인근로자지원센터나 고용노동부 고객상담센터(1350), 노동청에서 실질적인 지원과 상담을 받을 수 있습니다.

user-question: What are the options for workers in cases where reporting procedures are delayed and resolution of a case is delayed?
assistant-response: If the worker is experiencing delays in the resolution of their case due to delays in the reporting process, they can file a complaint with the Labor Office or visit the Ministry of Employment and Labor directly to inquire about the progress. In order to resolve the issue quickly, it is important to prove that the process is being delayed through continuous inquiries and documentation of the case progress. In Korea, there are organizations that can help with labor-related issues, such as the Ministry of Employment and Labor, the Labor Office, and the Korea Legal Aid Corporation, which provides free legal consultation. These organizations also provide consultation services for foreign workers, so please contact them for assistance when necessary.

user-question: Paano makakatanggap ng kabayaran ang mga dayuhang manggagawa kung dumaranas sila ng pinsala sa pag-iisip dahil sa hindi patas na pagtrato?
assistant-response: Kung ang isang dayuhang manggagawa ay dumanas ng pinsala sa pag-iisip dahil sa hindi patas na pagtrato, maaari siyang humingi ng kabayaran sa pamamagitan ng isang sibil na kaso sa Korea. Una, dapat kang mangolekta ng ebidensya ng hindi patas na pagtrato at magsampa ng kaso sa korte batay dito. Maaaring kumplikado ang mga legal na paglilitis na ito, kaya inirerekomenda na humingi ka ng legal na payo. Maaari kang humiling ng pagsisiyasat sa pamamagitan ng pagsusumite ng reklamo sa Opisina ng Paggawa, at maaari kang makatanggap ng kaluwagan sa pamamagitan ng Labor Relations Commission. Sa Korea, ang mga dayuhang manggagawa ay maaaring makatanggap ng libreng konsultasyon sa Ministry of Employment and Labor's Customer Service Center (telepono 1350), at maaari ring makatanggap ng praktikal na tulong sa Foreign Worker Support Center. Bilang karagdagan, ang iba't ibang non-profit na organisasyon na sumusuporta sa mga dayuhang manggagawa at imigrante ay nagbibigay ng legal at may kaugnayan sa paggawa na pagpapayo.

user-question: นายจ้างของฉันต้องเตรียมเอกสารอะไรบ้างในการต่ออายุวีซ่า?
assistant-response: เอกสารที่นายจ้างต้องจัดเตรียมเพื่อต่ออายุวีซ่า โดยทั่วไปจะประกอบด้วยสัญญาจ้าง สำเนาใบรับรองการจดทะเบียนธุรกิจ จดหมายแนะนำตัวจากนายจ้าง และต้นขั้วการจ่ายเงิน สัญญาจ้างงานจะชี้แจงข้อกำหนดและเงื่อนไขการจ้างงานของพนักงาน สำเนาใบรับรองการจดทะเบียนธุรกิจพิสูจน์การดำเนินธุรกิจตามกฎหมายของนายจ้าง และโปรไฟล์บริษัทจะให้ข้อมูลพื้นฐานเกี่ยวกับธุรกิจของนายจ้าง ต้นขั้วค่าจ้างจะใช้เป็นหลักฐานว่าคนงานได้รับค่าจ้างที่เหมาะสม เอกสารเหล่านี้อาจแตกต่างกันไปขึ้นอยู่กับประเภทของวีซ่าและสถานการณ์การจ้างงานของแต่ละบุคคล ดังนั้นขอแนะนำให้คุณตรวจสอบกับสำนักงานตรวจคนเข้าเมืองเพื่อดูรายการเอกสารที่ถูกต้อง สำหรับข้อมูลโดยละเอียดเกี่ยวกับเอกสารและขั้นตอนที่จำเป็นสำหรับการต่ออายุวีซ่า โปรดติดต่อสำนักงานตรวจคนเข้าเมืองที่ใกล้ที่สุดหรือตรวจสอบเว็บไซต์ของสำนักงานใหญ่นโยบายคนเข้าเมืองและชาวต่างชาติ กระทรวงยุติธรรม คุณสามารถขอความช่วยเหลือจากศูนย์ช่วยเหลือแรงงานต่างด้าวของเกาหลีซึ่งสนับสนุนแรงงานต่างชาติได้

user-question: Avtomatik kengaytma amalga oshirildi, lekin ishchi voz kechishi mumkinmi?
assistant-response: Agar mehnat shartnomasi avtomatik ravishda uzaytirilsa ham, xodim uni rad etishi mumkin. Mehnat shartnomasi ishchi va ish beruvchi o'rtasidagi kelishuv asosida tuziladi, agar xodim shartnomani uzaytirishni istamasa, u shartnomani bekor qilish niyatini oldindan aytib berishi kerak. Agar ish beruvchi ishchining xohishiga qarshi shartnomani majburiy ravishda uzaytirishga harakat qilsa, bu adolatsiz harakat deb hisoblanishi mumkin. Mehnat shartnomalari bilan bog'liq masalalar bo'yicha siz Bandlik va mehnat vazirligining Mijozlarga xizmat ko'rsatish markaziga (hudud kodisiz 1350) yoki eng yaqin mehnat idorasiga tashrif buyurib, maslahat olishingiz mumkin. Chet ellik ishchilarni qo'llab-quvvatlash markazidan ham yordam olishingiz mumkin.

user-question: Xodim elektron mehnat shartnomasini to'ldirgandan so'ng shartnoma shartlarini o'zgartirmoqchi bo'lsa, qanday tartib-qoidalarga rioya qilish kerak?
assistant-response: Agar xodim elektron mehnat shartnomasi shartlarini o'zgartirishni xohlasa, o'zgartirishlar birinchi navbatda ish beruvchi bilan o'zaro kelishib olinishi kerak. Kelishuvga erishilgandan so'ng, mavjud elektron mehnat shartnomasini o'zgartirish yoki yangi shartnoma tuzish kerak. Ushbu jarayon davomida o'zgartirilgan shartnoma shartlari yozma ravishda aniq yozilishi va qonuniy kuchga ega bo'lishi uchun ishchi va ish beruvchi tomonidan imzolanishi kerak. Elektron imzolar ham qonuniy kuchga ega, shuning uchun siz ulardan foydalanishingiz mumkin. Shu munosabat bilan siz Mehnat vazirligi yoki Bandlik va mehnat munosabatlari vazirligining Mijozlarga xizmat ko‘rsatish markazi (hudud kodisiz 1350) orqali batafsil tartiblar va tegishli qonunlar bo‘yicha maslahat olishingiz mumkin. Shuningdek, siz chet ellik ishchilarni qo'llab-quvvatlovchi mehnat bilan bog'liq nodavlat tashkilotlar yoki yuridik yordam markazlaridan qo'shimcha yordam olishingiz mumkin.

user-question: 解雇事前の通知なしに労働者を直ちに解雇した場合、法的問題になる可能性がありますか？
assistant-response: 韓国での解雇事前の通知なしに労働者を直ちに解雇することは法的問題になる可能性があります。労働基準法によれば、ユーザーは労働者を解雇するには少なくとも30日前に解雇予告をしなければならず、これを守らない場合は30日分以上の通常賃金を支払わなければなりません。この規則は、労働者の突然の失業に備えて保護するためのものです。ただし、労働者の重大な過失による解雇の場合には例外がある場合があります。労働基準法に関する問題についてより多くの情報が必要な場合や相談が必要な場合は、外国人労働者支援センター、雇用労働部顧客相談センター（1350）または最寄りの労働庁にお問い合わせください。これらの機関は、外国人労働者や移民に実質的な援助と情報を提供することができます。

user-question: คนงานจะเจรจาเงื่อนไขการจ่ายเงินชดเชยได้อย่างไร?
assistant-response: เงินชดเชยคือจำนวนเงินที่พนักงานจะได้รับเมื่อเกษียณอายุหากเขาหรือเธอทำงานมานานกว่าหนึ่งปี หากคุณต้องการเจรจาเงื่อนไขการจ่ายค่าชดเชย คุณสามารถตรวจสอบข้อกำหนดที่เกี่ยวข้องกับค่าชดเชยที่ระบุไว้ในสัญญาจ้างงาน และหากจำเป็น ให้เจรจากับนายจ้างเพื่อเสนอเงื่อนไขที่เป็นประโยชน์มากขึ้น ในเวลานี้ คุณต้องเข้าใจมาตรฐานขั้นต่ำสำหรับค่าชดเชยตามพระราชบัญญัติมาตรฐานแรงงานของเกาหลี และการเจรจากับนายจ้างจะต้องดำเนินการตามข้อตกลงร่วมกัน คุณสามารถเตรียมเอกสารสำหรับการเจรจาและรับความช่วยเหลือจากภายนอกได้หากจำเป็น หากคุณต้องการข้อมูลเพิ่มเติมหรือความช่วยเหลือเกี่ยวกับค่าชดเชย คุณสามารถติดต่อศูนย์สนับสนุนแรงงานต่างด้าว ศูนย์บริการลูกค้ากระทรวงการจ้างงานและแรงงาน (1350) หรือสำนักงานแรงงานในพื้นที่ของคุณ คุณยังสามารถรับคำแนะนำทางกฎหมายผ่านองค์กรที่ให้บริการให้คำปรึกษาทางกฎหมายฟรีสำหรับแรงงานต่างชาติ

user-question: Ano ang ilang mga kaso kung saan ang isang kumpanya ay legal na pinarusahan dahil sa pagtanggi sa isang kahilingan upang mapabuti ang kapaligiran sa pagtatrabaho nito?
assistant-response: Sa Korea, ang mga kaso kung saan ang mga kumpanyang tumanggi sa mga kahilingan na mapabuti ang mga kondisyon sa pagtatrabaho ay maaaring legal na parusahan ay pangunahing nauugnay sa mga paglabag sa Occupational Safety and Health Act. Ayon sa batas na ito, ang mga employer ay may tungkulin na gumawa ng mga kinakailangang hakbang upang maprotektahan ang kaligtasan at kalusugan ng kanilang mga manggagawa. Kung nilalabag ito ng isang kumpanya at tumanggi sa isang kahilingan na pahusayin ang kapaligiran sa pagtatrabaho nang walang makatwirang dahilan, sa gayo'y nagdudulot ng panganib sa kaligtasan at kalusugan ng mga manggagawa, ang kumpanya ay maaaring sumailalim sa mga multa o kriminal na parusa. Halimbawa, kung ang isang kumpanya ay napatunayang nabigo sa pagtupad sa mga legal na obligasyon nito kapag nangyari ang isang seryosong insidente sa kaligtasan, ang mga responsable ay maaaring mapatawan ng mga multa o pagkakulong. Kung ikaw ay nahihirapan sa mga isyu sa kapaligiran sa trabaho, maaari kang humingi ng tulong sa Korea Occupational Safety and Health Agency (KOSHA) o sa Ministry of Employment and Labor. Ang mga organisasyong ito ay nagbibigay ng mga pagsusuri sa kaligtasan, legal na payo at, kung kinakailangan, gabay sa legal na aksyon.

user-question: 特定の業界で休憩時間が異なる場合は何ですか？
assistant-response: 韓国の勤労基準法によると、一般的に勤労時間が4時間の場合は30分以上の休憩時間が与えられ、8時間の場合は1時間以上の休憩時間が与えられなければなりません。ただし、特定の業界では、これらの基準を異なる方法で適用することができます。例えば、運輸業や保健業などの業種では、労働者の業務特性上、連続的な勤務が必要な場合や緊急の状況が発生することがあり、休憩時間の配置が柔軟に調整されることがあります。そのような場合は、労働者とユーザーが協議し、労働契約または団体協定に基づいて休憩時間を調整できます。休憩時間や勤務時間に関する具体的な権利を知りたい場合や相談が必要な場合は、雇用労働部顧客相談センター（局番なし1350）または外国人員相談センター（1577-0071）にお問い合わせください。これらの機関はさまざまな言語でカウンセリングを提供し、労働条件に関する情報を提供します。

user-question: Maaari ba itong maging isang legal na isyu kung ang mga manggagawa ay kailangang bumili ng kagamitang pangkaligtasan mula sa kanilang sariling bulsa?
assistant-response: Ayon sa Occupational Safety and Health Act ng Korea, ang mga tagapag-empleyo ay obligado na magbigay sa mga manggagawa ng mga kinakailangang kagamitang pangkaligtasan upang maprotektahan ang kanilang kaligtasan at kalusugan. Samakatuwid, kung ang mga manggagawa ay kailangang bumili ng kagamitang pangkaligtasan mula sa kanilang sariling bulsa, maaaring ito ay isang legal na isyu. Ang mga tagapag-empleyo ay dapat magbigay ng naaangkop na kagamitang pang-proteksyon upang ang mga manggagawa ay makapagtrabaho nang ligtas, at kung hindi nila ito maibigay, ang mga manggagawa ay maaaring mag-ulat nito sa Ministry of Employment and Labor. Para sa mga isyu na nauugnay sa pagbibigay ng kagamitang pangkaligtasan, maaari kang makipag-ugnayan sa Industrial Accident Prevention Guidance Division o Labor Standards Division ng Ministry of Employment and Labor, at ang Korea Occupational Safety and Health Agency (KOSHA) ay maaari ding magbigay ng kaugnay na impormasyon.

user-question: What are some cases where workers who exceeded their contract extension limit obtained regular employment status through litigation?
assistant-response: In Korea, there are cases where irregular workers who worked beyond the contract period were recognized as regular workers through lawsuits. For example, among Supreme Court precedents, there is a case where a worker who worked as a contract worker for a certain period of time performed virtually the same work as a regular worker during the process of the contract being repeatedly renewed, and the continuity of the employment relationship was recognized and converted to a regular worker. Such rulings are made in consideration of the fact that the worker was actually performing work equivalent to a regular worker and employment stability. If you are considering legal advice or lawsuits regarding such issues, you can contact the Foreign Workers Support Center, the Ministry of Employment and Labor Customer Service Center (1350), or your local labor office to receive legal assistance or counseling.

user-question: Shartnomani bekor qilgandan so'ng, foydalanuvchi xabar berish tartib-qoidalariga rioya qilmasa, qanday jazolarga duch kelishi mumkin?
assistant-response: Mehnat shartnomasi tugagach, agar ish beruvchi uzrli sabablarsiz oldindan ogohlantirmasdan xodimni ishdan bo'shatgan bo'lsa, u "Mehnat me'yorlari to'g'risida"gi qonunga muvofiq jarimaga tortilishi mumkin. Ish beruvchilar ishchilarni ishdan bo'shatish to'g'risida kamida 30 kun oldin xabardor qilishlari kerak, agar ular buni qilmasa, kamida 30 kunlik muntazam ish haqini to'lashlari shart. Agar ish beruvchi ushbu bildirishnoma tartib-qoidalariga rioya qilmasa, ishchi bu haqda Mehnat idorasiga xabar berish orqali yordam olishi mumkin. Agar xodim ishdan bo'shatish tartibida muammo borligini aniqlasa, u yordam so'rash uchun Bandlik va mehnat vazirligi huzuridagi mahalliy mehnat idorasiga yoki chet el ishchi kuchi maslahat markaziga murojaat qilishi mumkin. Ushbu tashkilotlar ishchilarning huquqlarini himoya qiladi va adolatsiz ishdan bo'shatilganlik uchun maslahat va yordam beradi.

user-question: 雇主和工人如何共同努力避免遗漏所需物品？
assistant-response: 为了使雇主和工人能够合作并防止遗漏必需品，在签订劳动合同时明确基本工作条件并在开始工作前相互审查非常重要。雇佣合同必须包括工作时间、工资、假期和福利等基本项目，这可以减少对工作条件的误解。另外，如果劳动者有不明白的地方，可以通过与用人单位的交谈来澄清，或者接受劳动相关专家的建议。在韩国，外国工人可以通过就业和劳动部或主管劳动办公室获得起草雇佣合同的帮助。还可以从外籍工人咨询中心或工会获得建议。

user-question: संविदात्मक स्पष्टता सुनिश्चित करने के लिए कौन से उपयोगकर्ता प्रशिक्षण कार्यक्रमों की आवश्यकता है?
assistant-response: आपके अनुबंध में स्पष्टता सुनिश्चित करने के लिए आपके रोजगार अनुबंध को समझना महत्वपूर्ण है। इस उद्देश्य से, कोरिया विदेशी श्रमिकों और अप्रवासियों के लिए विभिन्न प्रकार के प्रशिक्षण कार्यक्रम प्रदान करता है। उदाहरण के लिए, रोजगार और श्रम मंत्रालय और विदेशी कार्यबल सहायता केंद्र द्वारा प्रदान किया जाने वाला 'विदेशी श्रमिक प्रशिक्षण कार्यक्रम' रोजगार अनुबंधों और बुनियादी श्रम कानून का मसौदा तैयार करने और व्याख्या करने पर प्रशिक्षण प्रदान करता है। ये कार्यक्रम आपके अनुबंध की प्रमुख शर्तों, जैसे वेतन, काम के घंटे और छुट्टी को समझने में आपकी मदद करते हैं। इन प्रशिक्षण कार्यक्रमों में भाग लेने के लिए, आप निकटतम विदेशी कार्यबल सहायता केंद्र से संपर्क कर सकते हैं या रोजगार और श्रम मंत्रालय की वेबसाइट के माध्यम से जानकारी प्राप्त कर सकते हैं। इसके अतिरिक्त, यदि आप कोरियाई भाषा से परिचित नहीं हैं, तो व्याख्या सेवाएँ प्रदान की जाती हैं, इसलिए कृपया उनका लाभ उठाएँ।

user-question: What are some cases where an employee has submitted notice of resignation, but the company does not accept it?
assistant-response: If an employee clearly expresses his or her intention to resign and submits a letter of resignation, the company must legally acknowledge it. According to the Labor Standards Act, an employee may resign after a certain period of time (usually 30 days) from the date of submission of the letter of resignation. Even if the company does not acknowledge it, the resignation is legally effective. However, if there are special conditions in the employment contract, they may be followed. If you encounter such problems, you can contact the Customer Service Center of the Ministry of Employment and Labor (1350 without area code) or your local Employment and Labor Office for help. You can also receive counseling from labor-related organizations such as the Federation of Korean Trade Unions.

user-question: What are the legal standards for ensuring clarity in a contract?
assistant-response: In order to ensure the clarity of the contract, it is important to include clear terms and conditions in the contract. According to the Civil Code of Korea, a contract is established by agreement between the parties, and the content of the agreement must be clear. The contract must include information on the contracting parties, the purpose of the contract, rights and obligations, methods of performance, and measures in case of breach of contract. In addition, when writing a contract, it is a rule to write it in Korean, and if a foreign language contract is required, it is recommended to prepare a translation. user-question: 契約延長限度を超えたが会社がこれを正規職転換と認めていない事例で裁判所の判断は？
assistant-response: 韓国で外国人労働者が契約延長限度を超えたにもかかわらず、会社がこれを正規職転換として認めない場合、裁判所は主に労働契約の実質内容を検討します。もし労働者が長期間にわたって繰り返し契約を更新してきており、業務の持続性が認められる場合であれば、裁判所はこれを事実上の正規職労働者と判断することができます。特に、「期間制及び短時間労働者保護等に関する法律」により、2年を超えて同じ業務を遂行する場合、正規職に転換しなければならないという規定が適用される場合があります。このような問題について支援を受けたい場合は、韓国の雇用労働部や外国人労働者支援センターに相談を要請することができます。これらの機関は、外国人労働者の権益保護のために様々な法律相談サービスを提供しています。

user-question: Ano ang mga legal na proteksyon para sa mga dayuhang manggagawa kung nakakaranas sila ng diskriminasyon sa trabaho dahil sa pagkakaiba ng kultura?
assistant-response: Sa Korea, kung ang isang dayuhang manggagawa ay nakakaranas ng diskriminasyon sa trabaho dahil sa pagkakaiba ng kultura, siya ay maaaring protektahan ng Anti-Discrimination Act at ng Labor Standards Act. Sa partikular, ang Artikulo 6 ng Labor Standards Act ay nagsasaad na ang mga employer ay hindi dapat magdiskrimina laban sa mga manggagawa batay sa kanilang nasyonalidad, relihiyon, o katayuan sa lipunan. Bukod pa rito, ang mga internasyonal na batas tulad ng International Convention on Human Rights ay maaari ding banggitin alinsunod sa mga internasyonal na pamantayan na nagbabawal sa diskriminasyon sa lahi. Kung mangyari ang ganitong diskriminasyon, maaaring magsampa ng reklamo ang mga dayuhang manggagawa sa Ministry of Employment and Labor o humiling ng tulong mula sa National Human Rights Commission. Ang mga dayuhang manggagawa na nakaranas ng diskriminasyon ay maaaring makatanggap ng pagpapayo at suporta sa pamamagitan ng pakikipag-ugnayan sa Customer Service Center ng Ministry of Employment and Labor (1350, walang area code) o sa National Human Rights Commission ng Korea (1331, walang area code). Nagbibigay ang mga organisasyong ito ng mga serbisyong multilinguwal para sa mga dayuhan, para makatanggap ka ng tulong nang walang hadlang sa wika.

user-question: 病気のうち治療費補償を会社から受けることができる基準は何ですか？

user-question: เงื่อนไขการคืนสถานะที่ระบุไว้ในสัญญาการจ้างงานมีการควบคุมอย่างไร

user-question: Каковы условия перевода временных работников в разряд постоянных работников в соответствии со статьей 17-2 Закона о трудовых стандартах?
assistant-response: Условия, при которых работник по срочным контрактам может быть преобразован в обычного работника, не указаны в статье 17-2 Закона о трудовых нормах. Например, могут быть приняты во внимание производительность труда работников, работающих по срочным контрактам, потребность компании в рабочей силе и содержание трудового договора. Если вы хотите узнать больше о преобразовании временных работников в постоянных работников, вы можете обратиться в Министерство занятости и труда или в ближайшее бюро труда или получить совет от такой профсоюзной организации, как Корейская федерация профсоюзов. user-question: Why is clarity of contract important?
assistant-response: Clarity of a contract plays an important role in preventing unnecessary disputes and reducing misunderstandings that may arise during the performance of a contract by clarifying the rights and obligations of the contracting parties. An unclear contract may result in legal disputes due to differences in interpretation, which may be particularly disadvantageous to foreign workers and immigrants. Therefore, when drafting a contract, specific and clear expressions should be used so that each clause can be clearly understood. In the event of problems or disputes related to a contract, institutions that can provide legal assistance include the Korea Legal Aid Corporation and the Foreign Workers Support Center in Korea. These institutions provide legal advice and support for foreign workers and immigrants.

user-question: 労働基準法第17条が適用されない労働形態は何ですか？

user-question: Какова правовая защита иностранных рабочих, если они подвергаются дискриминации на работе из-за культурных различий?
assistant-response: В Корее, если иностранный работник подвергается дискриминации на работе из-за культурных различий, он или она могут быть защищены Законом о борьбе с дискриминацией и Законом о трудовых стандартах. В частности, статья 6 Закона о трудовых стандартах предусматривает, что работодатели не должны дискриминировать работников на основании их национальности, религии или социального статуса. Кроме того, в соответствии с международными стандартами, запрещающими расовую дискриминацию, можно также ссылаться на международные законы, такие как Международная конвенция о правах человека. Если такая дискриминация имеет место, иностранные рабочие могут подать жалобу в Министерство занятости и труда или обратиться за помощью в Национальную комиссию по правам человека. Иностранные работники, подвергшиеся дискриминации, могут получить консультацию и поддержку, обратившись в Центр обслуживания клиентов Министерства занятости и труда (1350, без кода города) или в Национальную комиссию по правам человека Кореи (1331, без кода города). Эти организации предоставляют многоязычные услуги для иностранцев, поэтому вы можете получить помощь без языковых барьеров.

user-question: Các vấn đề pháp lý sẽ ra sao nếu hệ thống làm việc linh hoạt được đưa ra nhưng công ty rút lại mà không hỏi ý kiến ​​nhân viên?

user-question: 연장 근로를 요청받았을 때 근로자가 거부할 수 있는 조건은 무엇인가요?

user-question: จะต้องดำเนินการขั้นตอนใดในการเปลี่ยนแปลงข้อกำหนดและเงื่อนไขที่ระบุในสัญญาจ้างงาน?
assistant-response: หากต้องการเปลี่ยนแปลงข้อกำหนดและเงื่อนไขที่ระบุไว้ในสัญญาจ้างงาน ทั้งคนงานและนายจ้างต้องยอมรับการเปลี่ยนแปลง ขั้นแรก คุณต้องสร้างสัญญาจ้างใหม่ที่ระบุเงื่อนไขที่คุณต้องการเปลี่ยนแปลงโดยเฉพาะ และต้องลงนามโดยทั้งสองฝ่าย การเปลี่ยนแปลงสัญญาเหล่านี้ไม่สามารถเปลี่ยนเป็นเงื่อนไขที่เป็นผลเสียต่อคนงานตามกฎหมายมาตรฐานแรงงานได้ และจำเป็นต้องมีคำอธิบายและขั้นตอนการยินยอมที่เพียงพอสำหรับคนงาน องค์กรที่สามารถรับความช่วยเหลือเกี่ยวกับปัญหาที่เกี่ยวข้องกับสัญญาจ้างงาน ได้แก่ กระทรวงการจ้างงานและแรงงาน และบริการชดเชยและสวัสดิการแรงงานของเกาหลี องค์กรเหล่านี้ให้บริการให้คำปรึกษาและระงับข้อพิพาทเกี่ยวกับสภาพการทำงาน นอกจากนี้ยังมีบริการให้คำปรึกษาหลายภาษาที่ศูนย์ช่วยเหลือแรงงานต่างด้าว

user-question: มีการต่ออายุอัตโนมัติ แต่พนักงานสามารถเลือกไม่ใช้ได้หรือไม่
assistant-response: แม้ว่าสัญญาจ้างงานจะขยายออกไปโดยอัตโนมัติ พนักงานก็อาจปฏิเสธได้ สัญญาจ้างงานจะจัดทำขึ้นตามข้อตกลงระหว่างคนงานกับนายจ้าง หากคนงานไม่ต้องการต่อสัญญา เขาหรือเธอจะต้องสื่อสารเจตนารมณ์ที่จะบอกเลิกสัญญาล่วงหน้าอย่างชัดเจน หากนายจ้างพยายามบังคับต่อสัญญาโดยขัดต่อความประสงค์ของคนงาน อาจถือเป็นการกระทำที่ไม่ยุติธรรม สำหรับปัญหาที่เกี่ยวข้องกับสัญญาจ้างงาน คุณสามารถรับคำปรึกษาได้โดยไปที่ศูนย์บริการลูกค้ากระทรวงการจ้างงานและแรงงาน (1350 ไม่มีรหัสพื้นที่) หรือสำนักงานแรงงานที่ใกล้ที่สุด คุณสามารถขอความช่วยเหลือจากศูนย์ช่วยเหลือแรงงานต่างด้าวได้ด้วย

user-question: Nagkaroon ba ng anumang mga kaso kung saan ang paraan ng pagpirma ng isang elektronikong kontrata sa pagtatrabaho ay naging legal na isyu?
assistant-response: Ang mga kaso na naglabas ng mga legal na isyu na may kaugnayan sa paraan ng pagpirma ng mga kontrata sa elektronikong trabaho ay pangunahing kinasasangkutan ng mga kontrobersya sa bisa ng mga electronic na lagda. Sa Korea, ang mga electronic na lagda tulad ng mga pampublikong sertipiko ay legal na kinikilala sa ilalim ng Electronic Signature Act. Gayunpaman, sa ilang mga kaso, maaaring lumitaw ang mga legal na isyu kung ang mga electronic na lagda ay hindi naaangkop o ginagamit nang walang pahintulot ng pumirma. Halimbawa, kung ang isang elektronikong pirma ay tinanggap bilang katibayan na ang nagkontratang partido ay hindi nakakuha ng tahasang pahintulot, ang bisa ng kontrata ay maaaring tanggihan. Samakatuwid, kapag nagtatapos ng isang elektronikong kontrata sa pagtatrabaho, mahalagang tiyakin na ang pamamaraan ng lagda ay nakakatugon sa mga legal na kinakailangan. Kung kailangan mo ng konsultasyon o suporta sa mga legal na isyu na nauugnay sa mga elektronikong kontrata sa pagtatrabaho, maaari kang makatanggap ng mga serbisyong legal na pagpapayo mula sa Korea Legal Aid Corporation o Korea Labor Institute. Ang mga organisasyong ito ay nagbibigay ng libreng legal na payo at mga serbisyo ng suporta para sa mga dayuhang manggagawa.

user-question: What legal action can be taken when a worker is disadvantaged for refusing to work on a public holiday?
assistant-response: If a worker is disadvantaged because he or she refuses to work on a public holiday, this may be considered unfair treatment. According to the Korean Labor Standards Act, workers cannot be discriminated against without a justifiable reason. Work on public holidays can only be required if it is specified in the employment contract or collective agreement, otherwise the worker’s consent is required. If you are disadvantaged because you refuse to work on a public holiday, you can apply for relief for unfair labor practices to the Labor Relations Commission. You can also report or consult the Ministry of Employment and Labor about this situation. The Ministry of Employment and Labor and local labor registrars are the organizations that can help you when you face this problem. The Ministry of Employment and Labor can receive consultations and reports related to working conditions, and the local labor registrars can receive applications for relief for unfair labor practices.

user-question: ขั้นตอนการแจ้งเรื่องการเลือกปฏิบัติหรือการละเมิดสิทธิต่อกรมแรงงานเป็นอย่างไร
assistant-response: หากต้องการรายงานเหตุการณ์การเลือกปฏิบัติหรือการละเมิดสิทธิต่อกระทรวงแรงงาน คุณต้องรวบรวมหลักฐานที่เกี่ยวข้องก่อน หลักฐานอาจรวมถึงเอกสาร อีเมล บันทึก ฯลฯ ที่อาจพิสูจน์ว่าเป็นการเลือกปฏิบัติ จากนั้นเข้าไปที่เว็บไซต์กระทรวงการจ้างงานและแรงงานหรือเยี่ยมชมสำนักงานสาขาการจัดหางานและแรงงานที่ใกล้ที่สุดแล้วกรอกรายงาน รายงานจะต้องให้รายละเอียดข้อเท็จจริงและหลักฐานของความเสียหาย และคุณสามารถยื่นรายงานทางออนไลน์ได้ กระทรวงการจ้างงานและแรงงานจะตรวจสอบรายงานที่ได้รับ และหากจำเป็น จะดำเนินการสอบสวนเพิ่มเติมเพื่อยืนยันข้อเท็จจริงและดำเนินการตามความเหมาะสม แรงงานต่างด้าวและผู้อพยพสามารถรับความช่วยเหลือผ่านศูนย์สนับสนุนแรงงานต่างด้าวและรับคำปรึกษาในภาษาต่างๆ ผ่านทางศูนย์ให้คำปรึกษาลูกค้ากระทรวงการจ้างงานและแรงงาน (1350) คุณสามารถเยี่ยมชมสำนักงานแรงงานเพื่อรับคำปรึกษาหรือรายงานโดยตรงได้ หากคุณต้องการคำแนะนำทางกฎหมาย คุณสามารถรับคำแนะนำทางกฎหมายได้ฟรีผ่านทาง Korea Legal Aid Corporation

user-question: 口頭契約を書面契約に切り替える手順はどうなりますか？
assistant-response: 口頭契約を書面による契約に切り替えるには、まず口頭で合意された内容を文書として作成する必要があります。このとき、契約の主な条件、すなわち契約当事者、契約目的、契約内容、期間、対価などを明確に記載しなければなりません。作成した契約書は、両当事者が署名してそれぞれ保管するようにします。書面契約に切り替えることで、契約の証拠力を高め、今後発生する可能性のある紛争を防ぐことができます。書面契約の作成に支援が必要な場合は、韓国公認労務社会や大韓法律構造公団などの機関に問い合わせて法律相談を受けることができます。これらは、契約の作成とレビューに関する専門的なアドバイスを提供できます。

user-question: Điều kiện được hưởng chế độ nghỉ phép hàng năm được quy định trong hợp đồng lao động là gì?
assistant-response: Nghỉ phép hàng năm có lương là ngày nghỉ phép có lương mà nhân viên có thể nhận được sau khi làm việc trong một khoảng thời gian nhất định theo Đạo luật Tiêu chuẩn Lao động. Kể từ năm 2024, những người lao động tham gia làm việc trên 80% thời gian trong một năm sẽ được nghỉ phép 15 ngày có lương. Trong năm đầu tiên, bạn được hưởng một ngày nghỉ phép có lương cho mỗi tháng đi học đầy đủ. Việc nghỉ phép này có thể được sử dụng bất cứ khi nào người lao động muốn, nhưng cần phải thảo luận trước với người sử dụng lao động về thời điểm và cách sử dụng. Kỳ nghỉ chưa sử dụng có thể được chuyển sang năm tiếp theo hoặc được đền bù bằng tiền mặt, theo những điều kiện nhất định. Nếu bạn cần tư vấn cụ thể về thời gian nghỉ phép có lương hàng năm được quy định trong hợp đồng lao động của mình, bạn có thể nhận tư vấn thông qua Trung tâm Tư vấn Khách hàng của Bộ Lao động và Việc làm (1350 không có mã vùng) hoặc Trung tâm Hỗ trợ Người lao động Nước ngoài. Ngoài ra, mỗi văn phòng lao động khu vực còn cung cấp nhiều dịch vụ hỗ trợ pháp lý cho người lao động nước ngoài và người nhập cư.

user-question: Каковы юридические проблемы, если работник не получает необходимого лечения после возникновения профессионального заболевания?
assistant-response: Согласно Закону о страховании от несчастных случаев на производстве, профессиональные заболевания включены в несчастные случаи на производстве, и работники имеют право на получение лечения от них. Если ваш работодатель не обеспечивает адекватного лечения профессионального заболевания, это может привести к юридическим проблемам. Работники могут получить необходимые медицинские услуги, подав заявление на страхование от несчастных случаев на производстве в Корейскую службу компенсаций и социального обеспечения работникам. Если ваш работодатель не сотрудничает или не покрывает стоимость лечения в ходе этого процесса, вы можете сообщить об этом в Корейскую службу компенсаций и социального обеспечения работникам и принять меры. Иностранные работники или иммигранты могут получить помощь в Центре поддержки иностранных работников, а также могут получить консультации и поддержку через Центр обслуживания клиентов Министерства занятости и труда (1350) или ближайшую службу занятости.

user-question: 근로기준법 제17조가 적용되지 않는 근로 형태는 무엇인가요?
assistant-response: 근로기준법 제17조는 근로계약서에 명시되어야 할 사항들을 규정하고 있지만, 이 법이 적용되지 않는 경우도 있습니다. 주로 5인 미만 사업장에서는 일부 조항이 적용되지 않을 수 있으며, 특수고용직이나 프리랜서는 근로자로 간주되지 않아 근로기준법의 보호를 받지 못할 수 있습니다. 한국고용노동부 또는 근로복지공단에서 근로기준법과 관련된 자세한 정보를 얻을 수 있으며, 상담을 통해 자신의 근로 형태가 법의 보호를 받는지 확인할 수 있습니다.

user-question: Nếu vượt quá thời hạn gia hạn hợp đồng có thời hạn thì hậu quả sẽ như thế nào?
assistant-response: Ở Hàn Quốc, về nguyên tắc, hợp đồng lao động có thời hạn không được vượt quá hai năm. Nếu hợp đồng có thời hạn cố định được gia hạn quá hai năm, người lao động có quyền chuyển đổi sang hợp đồng không xác định thời hạn. Điều này phù hợp với Điều 4-2 của Đạo luật Tiêu chuẩn Lao động và là quy định nhằm ngăn chặn người sử dụng lao động gia hạn hợp đồng nhiều lần cho người lao động có thời hạn để tránh chuyển sang hợp đồng không xác định thời hạn. Vì vậy, những người lao động tạm thời đã làm việc trên hai năm có thể được đảm bảo việc làm ổn định như những người lao động bình thường. Nếu bạn muốn biết thêm về các vấn đề hoặc quyền liên quan đến hợp đồng làm việc có thời hạn, bạn có thể nhận trợ giúp thông qua Trung tâm Tư vấn của Bộ Lao động và Việc làm (1350) hoặc Trung tâm Hỗ trợ Người lao động Nước ngoài. Các tổ chức này cung cấp cho người lao động nước ngoài thông tin về luật lao động Hàn Quốc và hướng dẫn họ cách nhận hỗ trợ pháp lý.

user-question: 労働者が安全教育の内容を理解していない場合、会社が責任を負う義務はありますか？
assistant-response: 安全教育は、労働者の安全を確保するために不可欠であり、当社は、労働者が安全教育の内容を理解するために適切な措置を講じる責任があります。労働者が言語の障壁などのために教育内容を理解していない場合、会社はそれを補完するための追加の教育または通訳サービスを提供する必要があります。当社がこれらの義務を果たさずに事故が発生した場合、当社は法的責任を負うことがあります。韓国産業安全保健公団（KOSHA）では、外国人労働者のための多様な言語の安全教育資料を提供しており、必要に応じてこの機関を通じて支援を受けることができます。

user-question: Kung ang isang empleyado ay boluntaryong lumampas sa legal na oras ng pagtatrabaho, ano ang mangyayari sa allowance?
assistant-response: Sa Korea, ang pagbabayad ng mga allowance ay legal na ginagarantiyahan kahit na ang isang empleyado ay boluntaryong nagtatrabaho nang higit sa legal na oras ng pagtatrabaho. Ayon sa Labor Standards Act ng Korea, kung nagtatrabaho ka nang lampas sa legal na oras ng pagtatrabaho, dapat kang magbayad ng overtime pay, o 'overtime work allowance.' Ang overtime pay ay binabayaran ng higit sa 1.5 beses ng regular na sahod. Samakatuwid, kahit na ang isang empleyado ay boluntaryong nagtatrabaho ng dagdag na oras, ang kumpanya ay dapat magbayad ng kabayaran para sa overtime na trabaho. Kung gusto mong makatanggap ng mas detalyadong impormasyon o tulong sa mga isyu na may kaugnayan sa mga oras ng pagtatrabaho o allowance, maaari mong bisitahin ang Customer Service Center ng Ministry of Employment and Labor (1350 na walang area code) o ang Korea Workers' Compensation and Welfare Service para sa konsultasyon. Bukod pa rito, may mga organisasyon na nagbibigay ng libreng serbisyo sa legal na konsultasyon para sa mga dayuhang manggagawa, kaya mangyaring samantalahin ang mga ito.

user-question: 성희롱 예방 교육이 이루어졌음에도 사건이 발생했다면 회사가 책임을 면할 수 있나요?
assistant-response: 성희롱 예방 교육이 이루어졌더라도 사건이 발생한 경우 회사가 모든 책임을 면할 수 있는 것은 아닙니다. 한국의 남녀고용평등과 일·가정 양립 지원에 관한 법률에 따르면, 회사는 성희롱 예방을 위한 교육을 실시하고, 성희롱 사건 발생 시 즉시 적절한 조치를 취할 책임이 있습니다. 예방 교육만으로는 충분하지 않으며, 사건 발생 후의 대응 조치가 적절했는지도 회사의 책임 여부를 판단하는 중요한 요소입니다. 회사가 예방 교육 후에도 필요한 조치를 다하지 않았다면 책임을 면하기 어렵습니다. 성희롱 관련 문제에 대해 도움을 받고 싶다면, 한국여성인권진흥원이나 국가인권위원회에 문의할 수 있습니다. 이 기관들은 성희롱 피해에 대한 상담과 법적 지원을 제공합니다.

user-question: 连续病假的最长期限是怎样规定的？
assistant-response: 在韩国，法律没有规定病假的最长使用期限。根据雇佣合同或公司雇佣规则，病假使用期限的定义可能有所不同。通常，公司允许员工在生病时请病假，但病假时间长短可能因公司政策而异。因此，建议您向贵公司的人力资源部门或用人规定查询有关病假使用的具体信息。如果您需要有关使用病假的更多信息或需要有关您在工作中的权利的建议，您可以联系就业和劳工部的客户服务中心 (1350) 或离您最近的劳工办公室。此外，如果您是外籍劳工，您还可以通过外籍劳工支持中心获得相关咨询和支持。

user-question: Ishlash bonusi to'lov deklaratsiyasiga kiritilmagan bo'lsa, qo'shimcha to'lovni talab qila olamanmi?
assistant-response: Agar ish haqi to'g'risidagi deklaratsiyada ish natijalari bo'yicha bonuslar kiritilmagan bo'lsa, avvalo, mehnat shartnomasida ish haqi to'lash shartlari va me'yorlari ko'rsatilganligini tekshirishingiz kerak. Agar mehnat shartnomasida ish natijalari uchun mukofotlar to'lash aniq ko'rsatilgan bo'lsa, amaldagi shartlarga muvofiq bonus to'lanmagan taqdirda qo'shimcha to'lov talab qilinishi mumkin. Agar mehnat shartnomasida ish haqini to'lash shartlari va shartlari ko'rsatilmagan bo'lsa, siz ish natijalari uchun bonuslar odatdagidek to'langanligini tekshirishingiz mumkin. Agar ishlash uchun bonuslar ilgari muntazam ravishda to'langan bo'lsa, bunga asoslanib qo'shimcha to'lovlar talab qilinishi mumkin. Ushbu masalalarda yordam olishi mumkin bo'lgan tashkilotlar qatoriga Bandlik va mehnat vazirligining Mijozlarga xizmat ko'rsatish markazi (1350), mahalliy mehnat idoralari va chet ellik ishchilar yoki immigrantlar duch kelishi mumkin bo'lgan mehnat bilan bog'liq turli masalalar bo'yicha maslahatlar beradigan chet ellik ishchilarni qo'llab-quvvatlash markazlari kiradi ma'lumot beradi.

user-question: 労働契約に記載されている延長労働条件は法的に許可されていますか？
assistant-response: 韓国では、労働基準法に従って延長労働が法的に許可されています。労働者は1日8時間、週40時間を超えて勤務することはできませんが、労働者とユーザーとの合意がある場合は、1週間に最大12時間まで延長労働が可能です。労働契約に記載されている延長労働条件は、これらの法的基準を超えてはなりません。延長労働をする場合、通常賃金の150％以上の加算賃金を支給されなければなりません。延長労働条件が適法であることを確認したい場合は、外国人労働者支援センターや雇用労働部顧客相談センター（局番なしで1350）、または最寄りの労働庁に問い合わせて支援を受けることができます。このような機関では、外国人労働者や移民者も必要な支援と相談を受けることができます。

user-question: 工人因不公平解雇而要求赔偿的案件结果如何？

user-question: Ano ang ilang halimbawa ng mga legal na hindi pagkakaunawaan na maaaring lumitaw kapag ang isang kontrata ay walang kalinawan?

Sa kasong ito, maaaring i-claim ng manggagawa na ang trabaho ay ginawa ayon sa mga kondisyong naisip niya, habang ang employer ay maaaring mag-claim ng iba't ibang mga kondisyon, na maaaring humantong sa isang legal na hindi pagkakaunawaan. user-question: 労働基準法第15条によるユーザーの書面提出義務は、具体的に何を意味しますか？

user-question: แรงงานต่างชาติควรตอบสนองอย่างไรหากเขาหรือเธอถูกปฏิบัติอย่างไม่เอื้ออำนวยในแง่ของสภาพการทำงาน?

user-question: अनुबंध नवीनीकरण प्रक्रिया के दौरान कर्मचारी की सहमति की आवश्यकता कब होती है?

user-question: 権利侵害を受けた労働者が労働省に報告するために準備すべき書類は何ですか？

user-question: Какие проблемы возникают, если уведомление о расторжении договора подано позже установленного законом срока?

user-question: What is the court's decision in a case where an employee is forced to accept unfavorable terms when renewing his contract but refuses to do so?
assistant-response: If a worker is forced to renew a contract with unfavorable conditions and refuses them, the court may consider the worker's position in making a decision. The Korean Labor Standards Act protects workers from unfair treatment, and in particular, if unfavorable conditions are forced upon the renewal of a labor contract, it may be judged as an unfair dismissal. If the court determines that the worker's refusal to accept unfavorable conditions is justified, it may order the worker to maintain the original working conditions, or, if the worker was unfairly dismissed, order reinstatement and compensation for damages. Foreign workers or immigrants who face such problems can receive various support through the 'Foreign Workers Support Center' and request consultation from the 'Ministry of Employment and Labor Customer Service Center (1350).' In addition, the 'Labor Office' can provide information necessary to resolve legal issues. You can also receive help through the 'Korea Legal Aid Corporation', which provides free legal consultation.

user-question: 如果合同中未指定的任务不属于正常工作职责，工人有哪些权利？

user-question: 如果合同中包含含糊不清的语言，工人应该如何应对？

user-question: 对于未能确保合同清晰的用户，可以施加哪些法律制裁？
assistant-response: 如果雇主未能确保与外国工人签订合同的明确性，他或她可能会受到《劳动标准法》规定的法律制裁。如果合同中规定的工作条件不明确或合同本身没有，工人可以向雇主提出投诉，就业和劳动部可以进行调查。雇主如果违反最低工资、工作时间、假期等相关法律，可能会受到罚款或罚金。此外，雇主如果未准备或准备不充分的雇佣合同，可能会被处以最高 500 万韩元的罚款。如果您需要相关问题的帮助，可以联系雇佣劳动部客户服务中心（1350）或外籍劳动力咨询中心（1577-0071）进行咨询。您还可以访问当地的劳动办公室并接受直接咨询。

user-question: जब अनुबंध में शामिल नहीं किए गए काम के कारण काम के घंटे पार हो जाते हैं तो श्रमिकों के क्या अधिकार हैं?

user-question: Nalalapat ba ang legal na oras ng pagtatrabaho sa mga pampublikong holiday at holiday?

user-question: 派遣労働の許容範囲はどの産業や職種に限定されますか？
assistant-response: 韓国では、派遣労働は特定の産業や職種に限定されています。派遣労働が許可される職種は「派遣労働者保護等に関する法律」によって規定されており、一般に専門的かつ技術的な職種に主に限定されます。例えば、コンピュータプログラミング、経営コンサルティング、翻訳、通訳などの職種がこれに該当し得る。ただし、製造業の生産ライン業務や経費、清掃などの職種は、原則として派遣労働が制限されます。これは、派遣労働者が労働安定性を確保し、適切な労働条件を確保するための規定です。派遣労働に関する疑問や権利侵害に関する問題は、雇用労働部や労働相談センターで相談を受けることができます。また、韓国労働組合総連盟のような労働団体でも関連情報を提供することができます。

user-question: Xavfsizlik vositalarisiz ishlayotganda sodir bo'lgan baxtsiz hodisa uchun javobgarlikni o'z zimmasiga olmagan kompaniyaga qanday misol bo'lishi mumkin?

user-question: 해고 절차가 근로계약서에 명시된 조건과 다를 경우 법적 대응 방법은?

user-question: Какие первые действия может предпринять сотрудник, если на работе происходит сексуальное домогательство?

user-question: Trường hợp người lao động bị sa thải oan uổng sau khi được yêu cầu làm thêm giờ nhưng không chịu làm thêm là gì?

user-question: 契約終了通知手続きに従わなかったユーザーが労働者に損害賠償を請求された事例は？
assistant-response: 労働契約の終了時に、ユーザーは労働基準法に従って定められた手順に従わなければなりません。たとえば、正当な理由なく労働者を解雇するには、少なくとも30日前に解雇予告を行う必要があります。そうでない場合は、30日分の通常賃金を支払う必要があります。ユーザーがこの手続きに従わずに不当に契約を終了した場合、労働者は労働委員会に不当で救済を申請することができ、ユーザーに損害賠償を請求することができるケースがあります。このような場合、裁判所は、ユーザーが手続に違反したか、または労働者に実質的な損害が発生したかを判断し、賠償の有無を決定します。不当解雇されたと思われる場合は、外国人労働者支援センターや雇用労働部顧客相談センター（1350）、または労働庁に相談を要請することができます。これらの機関は、外国人労働者または移民に実質的な法的支援を提供します。

user-question: What are the legal issues if parental leave is approved but the company tries to cancel it midway?
assistant-response: Childcare leave is a legal right of workers, and companies cannot arbitrarily cancel it. According to the Labor Standards Act, childcare leave can be used for one year, and when workers apply for it, companies must, in principle, approve it. If a company attempts to cancel childcare leave, it may be considered a violation of the law, and workers may report it to the Labor Office. If a worker is unfairly canceled or disadvantaged during childcare leave, they may request relief from the Labor Relations Commission. For issues related to childcare leave, you can receive counseling and support through the Ministry of Employment and Labor or the Korea Workers’ Compensation and Welfare Service. In particular, you can receive detailed guidance and assistance through the Customer Service Center of the Ministry of Employment and Labor (1350 without area code).

user-question: 如果员工因侵犯其权利而被迫辞职，公司应承担什么责任？
assistant-response: 如果公司因侵犯工人的权利而强迫工人辞职，这可能构成不公平解雇，工人可以向劳动关系委员会申请救济。劳动关系委员会可以发布命令，要求员工复职或向公司赔偿损失。此外，工人还可以通过民事诉讼寻求赔偿。如果认定不公平解雇，员工可以索要解雇期间的工资，公司可能会承担额外的法律责任。可以获得不公平解雇帮助的组织包括雇佣劳动部和地方劳动委员会，外籍工人和移民可以从外籍工人支持中心、雇佣劳动部客户咨询中心（1350）获得咨询和支持，和劳工局。还建议您咨询就业法律师以提起法律诉讼。

user-question: What are the legal rights of foreign workers who cannot understand the working conditions provided only in Korean?
assistant-response: In Korea, employment conditions are provided in the form of an employment contract, and the employment contract must be provided in a language that the worker can understand. In other words, if a foreign worker is not provided with an employment contract in his or her native language or a language that he or she can understand, this may be a violation of the Labor Standards Act. In such cases, the foreign worker has the right to request an employment contract in a language that he or she can understand from the employer, and if the employer refuses to provide this, he or she may report it to the Ministry of Employment and Labor. Foreign workers can receive help from the Ministry of Employment and Labor or from the Foreign Worker Support Center in each region. These organizations provide counseling services in various languages, and if necessary, legal assistance is also available.

user-question: Paano tinukoy ang mga dahilan ng pagreretiro sa kontrata sa pagtatrabaho?

Bukod pa rito, maaaring magkaroon ng pagreretiro dahil sa mga pangangailangan ng pamamahala ng kumpanya o pagtanggal sa trabaho dahil sa mga kadahilanang nauugnay sa empleyado. Ang lahat ng dahilan ng pagreretiro ay dapat na malinaw na nakasaad sa kontrata sa pagtatrabaho, at ang isang nakasulat na kontrata ay kinakailangan upang protektahan ang mga karapatan at interes ng mga manggagawa. Kung mayroon kang anumang mga katanungan o nangangailangan ng tulong tungkol sa pagsulat ng kontrata sa pagtatrabaho at mga isyu na may kaugnayan sa pagreretiro, maaari kang makipag-ugnayan sa Ministry of Employment and Labor's Customer Service Center (1350 na walang area code) o sa Foreign Workforce Counseling Center (1577-0071). Bukod pa rito, maaari kang makatanggap ng praktikal na tulong at legal na payo mula sa Foreign Worker Support Center o sa lokal na tanggapan ng paggawa.

user-question: Shartnomada aniqlikni ta'minlashning huquqiy me'yorlari qanday?

user-question: 외국인 근로자가 비자 조건에 맞지 않는 직종에서 근무할 경우 처벌받을 수 있나요?

user-question: What legal recourse can an employee take if he or she is passed over for a promotion because of his or her nationality or race?
assistant-response: In Korea, if you are discriminated against based on nationality or race, you can take legal action under the Constitution and the Labor Standards Act. Article 11 of the Constitution states that all citizens are equal before the law and that no one may be discriminated against based on sex, religion, or social status. In addition, Article 6 of the Labor Standards Act stipulates that employers may not discriminate in terms and conditions of employment based on the nationality, religion, or social status of workers. If you experience such discrimination, you can file a complaint with the local labor office or request correction of discrimination with the National Human Rights Commission. If necessary, you can also file a civil lawsuit through the court. The National Human Rights Commission and local labor offices are institutions that can help with discrimination issues. The National Human Rights Commission is responsible for investigating and recommending correction of human rights violations and discrimination, while local labor offices provide support for resolving labor-related issues. In addition, foreign workers or immigrants can receive practical support through the Foreign Workers Support Center or the Ministry of Employment and Labor Customer Service Center (1350).

user-question: Người sử dụng lao động có những hướng dẫn gì để ngăn ngừa hành vi vi phạm Điều 17 và Điều 15 của Luật Tiêu chuẩn Lao động?
assistant-response: Tại Hàn Quốc, Điều 17 của Đạo luật Tiêu chuẩn Lao động quy định cụ thể các vấn đề phải có trong hợp đồng lao động và Điều 15 giải quyết các trường hợp điều kiện làm việc không được quy định cụ thể bằng văn bản. Khi giao kết hợp đồng lao động, người sử dụng lao động phải ghi rõ các điều kiện làm việc quan trọng như giờ làm việc, tiền lương, ngày nghỉ, ngày nghỉ trong hợp đồng lao động và cung cấp cho người lao động bằng văn bản. Điều này có thể làm tăng tính minh bạch trong hợp đồng lao động và ngăn ngừa tranh chấp. Một điều cần lưu ý là khi soạn thảo hợp đồng lao động có thể cung cấp bằng cách dịch sang ngôn ngữ liên quan để giúp người lao động hiểu được và nên thiết lập quy trình để kiểm tra xem người lao động có hiểu đầy đủ các điều khoản trong hợp đồng hay không. Bạn có thể nhận tư vấn về các vấn đề liên quan đến Đạo luật Tiêu chuẩn Lao động hoặc soạn thảo hợp đồng lao động từ Bộ Việc làm và Lao động hoặc Trung tâm Hỗ trợ Lực lượng Lao động Nước ngoài. Các tổ chức này cung cấp dịch vụ tư vấn pháp luật và dịch thuật cho người lao động nước ngoài, giúp họ hiểu và bảo vệ quyền lợi của mình.

user-question: Những quy định pháp luật nào căn cứ vào nghĩa vụ lập và cung cấp báo cáo tiền lương?

Theo quy định này, khi trả lương cho người lao động, người sử dụng lao động phải cung cấp bảng kê lương nêu chi tiết các thành phần tiền lương, cách tính, chi tiết khấu trừ... Điều này nhằm đảm bảo rằng người lao động biết rõ tiền lương của họ được tính như thế nào, tăng tính minh bạch về tiền lương và ngăn ngừa tranh chấp. Bạn cũng có thể nhận trợ giúp từ Trung tâm tư vấn lao động nước ngoài (Trung tâm tư vấn lực lượng lao động nước ngoài), nơi cung cấp dịch vụ tư vấn cho người lao động nước ngoài.

user-question: If a company unilaterally changes an employee's job, can it be considered a violation of rights?
assistant-response: If a company unilaterally changes the work of an employee, it is a change to an important condition of the employment contract, and if it enforces this without the employee's consent, it may be considered a violation of rights. In particular, if the change in the content of the work has a significant impact on the employee's life, it may be judged as a breach of the employment contract and legal action may be taken. The employee may object to such actions by the company and apply for relief to the Labor Relations Commission. If you encounter this situation, you can get help from the Foreign Workers Support Center or the Ministry of Employment and Labor Customer Service Center (1350). You can also request consultation with the local labor office to receive legal support.

user-question: แนวทางปฏิบัติสำหรับผู้ใช้เพื่อป้องกันการละเมิดมาตรา 17 และ 15 ของพระราชบัญญัติมาตรฐานแรงงานมีอะไรบ้าง

user-question: 병가 중 급여 지급이 중단된 경우 법원이 사용자에게 내린 판결은?
assistant-response: 한국에서는 근로자가 병가를 사용하는 경우, 법적으로 사용자가 병가 기간 동안 급여를 지급해야 할 의무는 없습니다. 따라서 병가 중 급여 지급이 중단되는 것은 법적으로 문제가 되지 않습니다. 다만, 근로기준법에 따라 사용자는 근로자가 업무 중 부상이나 질병을 얻은 경우 산재보험을 통해 보상을 받을 수 있습니다. 또한, 회사의 내부 정책이나 근로계약서에 병가 중 급여를 지급하기로 명시되어 있는 경우에는 그에 따라야 합니다. 병가와 관련된 급여 문제에 대해 더 자세한 정보를 원하시면, 고용노동부 고객상담센터(국번없이 1350)나 외국인근로자지원센터를 통해 상담을 받을 수 있습니다. 또한, 지역 노동청에서도 관련 도움과 상담을 받을 수 있습니다.

user-question: Ano ang naging desisyon ng korte sa isang kaso kung saan ang isang biktima ng sexual harassment ay dumanas ng mga disadvantages pagkatapos mag-ulat?
assistant-response: Kapag ang mga biktima ng sekswal na panliligalig ay dumanas ng mga kawalan pagkatapos mag-ulat, ang mga korte sa Korea ay may posibilidad na gumawa ng mga desisyon upang protektahan ang mga biktima. Halimbawa, kung ang mga hindi magandang hakbang laban sa biktima ay hinuhusgahan na hindi patas, ang kumpanya o ang may kasalanan ay maaaring managot para sa mga pinsala. Ang sekswal na panliligalig ay ipinagbabawal ng Equal Employment Opportunity Act, at anumang pagkilos ng disbentaha pagkatapos iulat ang pinsala ay maaaring parusahan ng batas. Kung naging biktima ka ng sexual harassment o nakaranas ng mga disadvantages pagkatapos iulat ito, maaari kang humiling ng pagpapayo mula sa Customer Counseling Center ng Ministry of Employment and Labor (1350 na walang area code) o ng Korea Women's Human Rights Promotion Agency sa ilalim ng Ministry of Pagkakapantay-pantay ng Kasarian at Pamilya. Ang mga organisasyong ito ay nagbibigay ng proteksyon sa biktima at legal na tulong.

user-question: Какую ответственность несет компания, если сотрудник вынужден уволиться из-за нарушения его прав?
assistant-response: Если компания вынуждает работника уволиться из-за нарушения его или ее прав, это может считаться несправедливым увольнением, и работник может подать заявление об освобождении от должности в Комиссии по трудовым отношениям. Комиссия по трудовым отношениям может издать приказ о восстановлении работника на работе или возмещении ущерба предприятию. Кроме того, работники могут требовать компенсации через гражданские иски. В случае признания несправедливого увольнения работник может требовать выплаты заработной платы за период увольнения, а компания может быть привлечена к дополнительной юридической ответственности. К организациям, которые могут получить помощь при несправедливом увольнении, относятся Министерство занятости и труда и местные трудовые комитеты, а иностранные рабочие и иммигранты могут получить консультации и поддержку в Центре поддержки иностранных рабочих, Центре консультирования клиентов Министерства занятости и труда (1350), и Бюро труда. Также рекомендуется проконсультироваться с адвокатом по трудовому праву для начала судебного разбирательства.

user-question: Yozma shartnoma tuzishda qanday lingvistik omillarni hisobga olish kerak?

Shartnomaning muhim qoidalari aniq tushunilishi va mehnat shartlari, ish haqi, ish vaqti, shartnoma muddati va hokazolarning to'g'ri ko'rsatilishini ta'minlashi kerak. Bundan tashqari, shartnomani imzolashdan oldin barcha shartlarni tushunganingizga ishonch hosil qiling va agar kerak bo'lsa, professional tarjimon yoki yuridik ekspertdan yordam so'rang. Chet ellik ishchilar Koreya Bandlik va mehnat vazirligi yoki Xorijiy ishchi kuchini qo‘llab-quvvatlash markazida shartnoma bo‘yicha maslahat olishlari mumkin. Bundan tashqari, Koreya yuridik yordam korporatsiyasi bepul yuridik maslahat beradi, shuning uchun siz shartnoma mazmunini tushunishingiz kerak bo'lganda yordam olishingiz mumkin.

user-question: 对于外国工人的工资低于韩国工人的案件，法院有何判决？
assistant-response: 在韩国，外籍工人与国内工人遵守相同的劳动标准法，并且必须获得相同工作的相同工资。如果外国工人的工资低于韩国工人，这可能会被视为歧视，法院可能会裁定这种歧视非法。韩国《劳动标准法》禁止工资歧视，特别是不允许基于国籍或种族的歧视。如果您需要有关这些问题的帮助，您可以访问韩国雇佣劳动部或当地的劳动办公室进行咨询。此外，您还可以通过外籍工人咨询中心（一个为外籍工人提供支持的组织）获得法律支持或咨询。

user-question: यदि अनुबंध अवधि के दौरान मुझे गलत तरीके से बर्खास्त कर दिया जाता है तो मेरी कानूनी सुरक्षा क्या है?
assistant-response: यदि कोरिया में अनुबंध अवधि के दौरान आपको अनुचित तरीके से बर्खास्त कर दिया गया है, तो आपको श्रम मानक अधिनियम के तहत संरक्षण प्राप्त हो सकता है। यदि आपको अनुचित तरीके से बर्खास्त किया गया है, तो आप श्रम संबंध आयोग के समक्ष राहत के लिए अनुरोध दायर कर सकते हैं, और श्रम संबंध आयोग बर्खास्तगी की वैधता की समीक्षा करेगा। यदि आपकी बर्खास्तगी अनुचित पाई जाती है, तो आप पुनः नियुक्ति या मुआवजे के हकदार हो सकते हैं। यदि बर्खास्तगी को अनुचित माना जाता है, तो कर्मचारी मूल पद पर पुनः बहाल किये जाने या उचित मुआवजे की मांग कर सकता है, और नियोक्ता को यह साबित करना होगा कि बर्खास्तगी उचित थी। यदि आपको लगता है कि आपको अनुचित तरीके से बर्खास्त किया गया है, तो आपको तुरंत अपने स्थानीय श्रम आयोग में दावा दायर करना चाहिए। विदेशी श्रमिक या आप्रवासी विदेशी श्रमिक सहायता केंद्र या रोजगार और श्रम मंत्रालय ग्राहक सेवा केंद्र (1350) जैसे संगठनों से सहायता प्राप्त कर सकते हैं। आप कानूनी सलाह लेने के लिए अपने स्थानीय श्रम कार्यालय भी जा सकते हैं।

user-question: Is the company responsible in cases where foreign workers are bullied due to cultural differences?
assistant-response: In Korea, if a worker is bullied in the workplace, the company is responsible for preventing and resolving it. According to the 'Workplace Bullying Prevention Act' that came into effect in June 2023, the company must establish a reporting procedure when bullying occurs and take measures to protect the victim through an appropriate investigation. If the company fails to fulfill this responsibility, the victimized worker can report it to the Ministry of Employment and Labor, and the company can be fined. If you would like help with workplace bullying, you can contact the Ministry of Employment and Labor or the Foreign Workers Counseling Center (1577-0071). They provide various language support services for foreign workers.

user-question: 对于一家公司未能解决因文化差异引起的冲突，法院会如何判决？
assistant-response: 如果公司未能解决因文化差异引起的冲突，法院可能会认定该公司未能履行作为雇主的责任。韩国《平等就业机会法》明确规定，雇主有责任预防和解决工作环境中的歧视，特别是当发生基于文化差异、种族或国籍的歧视时。法院可能会判定公司不采取行动构成非法歧视，如果公司不采取适当行动，可能会承担法律责任。可以为这些问题提供帮助的组织包括国家人权委员会、就业和劳动部以及当地的劳动咨询中心。这些组织可以提供有关歧视问题的咨询和法律援助。

user-question: Maaari bang ma-convert ang mga manggagawa sa mga regular na manggagawa kapag nalampasan na ang limitasyon ng extension ng isang fixed-term na kontrata?
assistant-response: Sa Korea, ang mga fixed-term na manggagawa ay maaaring ma-convert sa mga permanenteng kontrata kung nagtatrabaho sila sa parehong lugar ng trabaho nang higit sa dalawang taon. Ito ay isang panukala upang matiyak ang katatagan ng trabaho sa mga kaso kung saan ang mga empleyado ay gumanap ng parehong trabaho sa loob ng higit sa dalawang taon alinsunod sa batas para sa proteksyon ng mga hindi regular na manggagawa. Gayunpaman, bilang eksepsiyon, maaaring hindi ito naaangkop sa mga propesyonal, senior citizen, o recruitment upang makumpleto ang isang partikular na proyekto, kaya maaaring mag-iba ito depende sa partikular na sitwasyon. Upang makakuha ng higit pang impormasyon tungkol sa sitwasyong ito o makatanggap ng tulong kapag may nangyaring problema, inirerekumenda na bisitahin mo ang Ministry of Employment and Labor's Customer Service Center (1350 na walang area code) o ang Foreign Workforce Support Center para sa konsultasyon.

user-question: 労働契約に記載されている退職金の支払条件はどのように設定されますか？
assistant-response: 退職金は、労働者が1年以上勤務した場合に支払われます。労働契約書には、退職金の支払基準、計算方法、支払時期などが明示されなければなりません。通常、退職金は、労働者が最後の3ヶ月間に受け取った平均賃金に基づいて計算されます。退職金は、労働者またはユーザーによる契約の終了時に支払われます。契約に明確に記載されていない場合、または法的基準に満たない場合は、法的紛争が発生する可能性があります。退職金関連の問題や紛争が発生した場合、雇用労働部顧客相談センター（1350）や労働庁を通じて相談を受けることができます。また、外国人労働者のための外国人労働者支援センターでも支援を受けることができます。

user-question: यदि वीज़ा शर्तों को पूरा नहीं करने वाले कार्य करते समय कोई दुर्घटना होती है तो कंपनी की क्या ज़िम्मेदारी है?
assistant-response: यदि कोई दुर्घटना तब होती है जब कोई विदेशी कर्मचारी कोरिया में वीज़ा आवश्यकताओं को पूरा नहीं करने वाला काम कर रहा है, तब भी कंपनी को श्रम मानक अधिनियम के तहत दुर्घटना के लिए उत्तरदायी ठहराया जा सकता है। श्रम मानक अधिनियम सभी श्रमिकों पर लागू होता है, और रोजगार के प्रकार या वीज़ा की स्थिति की परवाह किए बिना श्रमिकों की सुरक्षा सुनिश्चित करना एक दायित्व है। इसलिए, कंपनी औद्योगिक दुर्घटना मुआवजा बीमा अधिनियम के अनुसार औद्योगिक दुर्घटना मुआवजा प्रक्रियाओं का पालन करती है, और श्रमिक अवैध कार्य स्थिति में होने पर भी औद्योगिक दुर्घटना बीमा लाभ प्राप्त कर सकते हैं। हालाँकि, वीज़ा शर्तों के उल्लंघन को एक अलग मुद्दे के रूप में माना जा सकता है, जिस स्थिति में आव्रजन नियंत्रण अधिनियम के तहत अतिरिक्त कानूनी मुद्दे उत्पन्न हो सकते हैं। जो संगठन इस स्थिति में सहायता प्राप्त कर सकते हैं उनमें रोजगार और श्रम मंत्रालय और औद्योगिक दुर्घटना मुआवजा बीमा निगम शामिल हैं। इसके अतिरिक्त, आप गैर-लाभकारी संगठनों या संस्थानों के माध्यम से कानूनी सलाह और समर्थन प्राप्त कर सकते हैं जो विदेशी श्रमिकों का समर्थन करते हैं, जैसे 'विदेशी मानव संसाधन सहायता केंद्र'। आप्रवासन संबंधी मुद्दों के लिए, यह अनुशंसा की जाती है कि आप न्याय मंत्रालय के आप्रवासन और विदेशी नीति मुख्यालय से संपर्क करें।

user-question: Nhân viên có thể thực hiện hành động pháp lý nào nếu yêu cầu làm thêm công việc không có trong hợp đồng?
assistant-response: Ở Hàn Quốc, nếu người lao động được yêu cầu làm thêm công việc không được quy định trong hợp đồng, người đó có quyền từ chối theo Đạo luật Tiêu chuẩn Lao động. Hợp đồng lao động phải ghi rõ giờ làm việc, chi tiết công việc, tiền lương, v.v. và nếu người lao động bị buộc phải làm công việc khác với những gì được ghi trong hợp đồng thì đây có thể được coi là những hướng dẫn không công bằng. Trong tình huống này, trước tiên bạn phải cố gắng giải quyết vấn đề thông qua đối thoại với người sử dụng lao động của mình. Nếu vấn đề này không được giải quyết, bạn có thể báo cáo với Bộ Việc làm và Lao động và yêu cầu hòa giải. Về mặt pháp lý, những thay đổi về điều khoản hợp đồng không có lợi cho người lao động có thể bị coi là không hợp lệ. Nếu gặp phải những vấn đề này, bạn có thể liên hệ với Trung tâm hỗ trợ người lao động nước ngoài hoặc Trung tâm dịch vụ khách hàng của Bộ Việc làm và Lao động (1350 không có mã vùng) để được trợ giúp. Ngoài ra, bạn có thể nhận được hỗ trợ và tư vấn pháp lý thông qua văn phòng lao động địa phương.

user-question: What are the case law situations where automatic extension is not permitted after the contract period expires?
assistant-response: Cases where automatic extension is not recognized after the contract period expires mainly depend on the conditions stated in the contract, and if there is no clear automatic extension clause, automatic extension may not be recognized when the contract expires. For example, if the employment contract clearly states the contract period and there is no separate automatic extension clause or agreement on renewal, the contract will end at the time of expiration. In addition, automatic extension may not be recognized even if there is no agreement between the parties or no explicit expression of intent for extension. If you need legal advice on the contract period and automatic extension issues, you can receive free legal advice through the Korea Legal Aid Corporation or the Korea Legal Aid Corporation. In addition, the Foreign Workers Support Center provides legal advice for foreign workers, so please contact such organizations if necessary.

user-question: Ano ang mga kondisyon para manalo ang isang manggagawa sa isang kaso kung saan unilateral na nag-aabiso ang kumpanya ng mga pagbabago sa kontrata sa pagtatrabaho?
assistant-response: Ang mga pagbabago sa kontrata sa pagtatrabaho ay dapat gawin sa pamamagitan ng kasunduan sa pagitan ng manggagawa at ng employer, at hindi maaaring unilaterally baguhin ng employer ang kontrata sa pagtatrabaho. Ang mga kondisyon kung saan nanalo ang manggagawa ay pangunahin kapag ang mga binagong kondisyon sa pagtatrabaho ay hindi pabor sa manggagawa at kapag napatunayang hindi pumayag o pinilit ang manggagawa sa proseso ng pagbabago. Bukod pa rito, mas malamang na manalo ka sa iyong kaso kahit na ginawa ang mga pagbabagong hindi paborable sa mga manggagawa nang walang makatwirang dahilan. Maaaring makita ng mga korte na ang mga karapatan ng manggagawa ay nilabag sa mga kasong ito. Kung nahaharap ka sa mga problemang ito, maaari kang makatanggap ng pagpapayo sa pamamagitan ng Foreign Worker Support Center o ng Ministry of Employment and Labor's Customer Counseling Center (1350). Sa partikular, ang mga lokal na tanggapan ng paggawa ay nagbibigay ng iba't ibang serbisyo ng suporta para sa mga dayuhang manggagawa at imigrante, at maaari ka ring makatanggap ng legal na payo at suporta para sa legal na aksyon.

user-question: 以工作时间发生的小错误作为解雇理由的案件，法院如何判决？
assistant-response: 法院对于因工作时间犯下的小错误而被解雇是否合理的决定可能会根据具体情况而有所不同。一般来说，很难因为小错误而被解雇。为了保护劳动者，韩国劳动法规定雇主解雇必须有正当理由，禁止“无正当理由解雇”。除非重复出现小错误或对公司造成严重损害，否则法院可能会认为解雇过度。如果出现与解雇相关的问题，外籍工人或移民可以通过联系雇佣劳动部客户服务中心（1350，无区号）或外籍工人支持中心获得帮助。此外，您也许可以通过当地劳工办公室获得其他法律建议或帮助。

user-question: Hisobot jarayonini davom ettirishdan oldin ishchilar o'z kompaniyasi bilan qanday maslahatlashishlari mumkin?
assistant-response: Kompaniya bilan muzokaralar olib borish uchun avvalo kompaniyaning inson resurslari vakili yoki bevosita rahbari bilan gaplashib ko'ring. Muammoni aniq tushuntirish va yechimni muhokama qilish uchun rasmiy uchrashuv tashkil qilishingiz mumkin. Agar to'g'ridan-to'g'ri suhbat qiyin bo'lsa, iltimosingizni rasmiy yozma ravishda etkazishingiz mumkin. Bu jarayonda his-tuyg'ularingizni nazorat qilish va muammoni hal qilishga e'tibor qaratish muhimdir. Agar muammo hal etilmasa yoki kelishuvga erishib bo'lmasa, siz Mehnat idorasiga yoki Chet elliklarni qo'llab-quvvatlash markaziga yordam so'rashingiz mumkin. Koreyada chet ellik ishchilarni qo'llab-quvvatlovchi turli tashkilotlar mavjud. Misol uchun, Xorijiy ishchi kuchini qo'llab-quvvatlash markazi mehnat sharoitlari bo'yicha maslahat beradi va Mehnat idorasi asossiz mehnat sharoitlari haqida rasman xabar berilishi mumkin bo'lgan tashkilotdir.

user-question: เมื่อพนักงานต้องการเปลี่ยนเงื่อนไขของสัญญาหลังจากทำสัญญาจ้างงานทางอิเล็กทรอนิกส์มีขั้นตอนที่ต้องปฏิบัติอย่างไร?
assistant-response: หากพนักงานประสงค์ที่จะเปลี่ยนแปลงข้อกำหนดและเงื่อนไขของสัญญาจ้างงานอิเล็กทรอนิกส์ การเปลี่ยนแปลงจะต้องได้รับการตกลงร่วมกันกับนายจ้างก่อน หลังจากบรรลุข้อตกลงแล้ว จะต้องแก้ไขสัญญาจ้างงานทางอิเล็กทรอนิกส์ที่มีอยู่หรือต้องร่างสัญญาใหม่ เงื่อนไขสัญญาที่เปลี่ยนแปลงในระหว่างกระบวนการนี้จะต้องได้รับการบันทึกเป็นลายลักษณ์อักษรอย่างชัดเจนและลงนามโดยทั้งคนงานและนายจ้างเพื่อให้มีผลทางกฎหมาย ลายเซ็นอิเล็กทรอนิกส์ยังถูกต้องตามกฎหมาย ดังนั้นคุณจึงสามารถใช้งานได้ โดยสามารถรับคำปรึกษาเกี่ยวกับขั้นตอนโดยละเอียดและกฎหมายที่เกี่ยวข้องผ่านทางกระทรวงแรงงานหรือศูนย์บริการลูกค้ากระทรวงการจ้างงานและแรงงาน (1350 โดยไม่มีรหัสพื้นที่) คุณยังสามารถรับความช่วยเหลือเพิ่มเติมจากองค์กรพัฒนาเอกชนที่เกี่ยวข้องกับแรงงานหรือศูนย์สนับสนุนทางกฎหมายที่สนับสนุนแรงงานต่างชาติได้

user-question: Maaari ba itong ituring na diskriminasyon kung ang isang kumpanya ay hindi nagbibigay ng mga kagamitang pangkaligtasan sa ilang mga manggagawa lamang?
assistant-response: Sa Korea, lahat ng manggagawa ay may karapatang magtrabaho nang ligtas, at ang mga tagapag-empleyo ay may obligasyon na magbigay sa mga manggagawa ng kinakailangang kagamitang pangkaligtasan. user-question: Are there any cases where a company was legally punished for not providing safety training materials?
assistant-response: Companies that do not provide safety education materials may be punished under the Occupational Safety and Health Act. According to this law, all employers must provide necessary safety and health education to their workers. If they violate this, the employer may be subject to imprisonment for up to 5 years or a fine of up to 50 million won. In fact, companies that fail to provide safety education and cause accidents are subject to legal liability, and this has been the case in many court cases. If you would like to consult about safety education and issues related to the Occupational Safety and Health Act, you can contact the Korea Occupational Safety and Health Agency (KOSHA) or the Ministry of Employment and Labor. These organizations provide safety education materials and provide legal advice.

user-question: Agar ishchi hisobot berganidan keyin noqulay ahvolga tushib qolsa, kompaniya javobgarlikka tortilishi mumkinmi?

Mehnat standartlari to'g'risidagi qonun ishchilarni qonuniy huquqlaridan foydalanganliklari uchun jazolashni taqiqlaydi va bunday hollarda ishchilar Mehnat idorasiga hisobot berish orqali huquqiy himoya olishlari mumkin. Koreyada mehnat bilan bog'liq masalalarda yordam olishingiz mumkin bo'lgan tashkilotlarga Bandlik va mehnat vazirligi qoshidagi har bir mahalliy mehnat idorasi kiradi va siz mehnat bo'yicha maslahatlar orqali muammoingizni qanday hal qilish bo'yicha ko'rsatmalar olishingiz mumkin. Bundan tashqari, Chet ellik ishchilarni qo'llab-quvvatlash markazi chet ellik ishchilarga huquqiy maslahat beradi.

user-question: Xodimlar mehnat shartnomasida muhim narsalar etishmayotganligini aniqlaganlarida qanday choralar ko'rishlari mumkin?
assistant-response: Agar mehnat shartnomasida muhim narsalar etishmayotgan bo'lsa, ishchi birinchi navbatda ish beruvchiga buni ko'rsatishi va qayta ko'rib chiqilgan shartnomani talab qilishi kerak. Agar ish beruvchi rad etsa yoki muammo hal etilmasa, ishchi bu haqda Bandlik va mehnat munosabatlari vazirligiga xabar berib, yordam olishi mumkin. Ushbu masalalarni hal etishda Bandlik va mehnat vazirligi vositachi vazifasini bajaradi, zarurat tug‘ilganda mehnat inspektorlari aralashib, tekshiruv o‘tkazishi mumkin. Vaziyatga qarab, ishchilar kasaba uyushmasi yoki chet elliklarni qo'llab-quvvatlash markazidan ham yordam olishlari mumkin. Bandlik va mehnat munosabatlari vazirligi mehnat sharoitlari bilan bog‘liq masalalar bilan shug‘ullanuvchi davlat organi bo‘lib, chet ellik ishchilar ham yordam olishlari mumkin. Bundan tashqari, Chet el fuqarolarini qo'llab-quvvatlash markazi yoki mahalliy kasaba uyushmalari huquqiy maslahat va yordam beradi, shuning uchun agar kerak bo'lsa, ularga murojaat qiling.

user-question: จะมีปัญหาทางกฎหมายอะไรบ้างหากคนงานไม่ได้รับการรักษาที่จำเป็นหลังจากเกิดโรคจากการทำงาน?
assistant-response: ตามกฎหมายการประกันค่าสินไหมทดแทนจากอุบัติเหตุทางอุตสาหกรรม กำหนดให้โรคจากการทำงานรวมอยู่ในอุบัติเหตุจากการทำงานด้วย และคนงานมีสิทธิได้รับการรักษาสำหรับโรคดังกล่าว หากนายจ้างของคุณไม่ให้การรักษาโรคจากการทำงานอย่างเหมาะสม อาจนำไปสู่ปัญหาทางกฎหมายได้ คนงานสามารถรับบริการทางการแพทย์ที่จำเป็นได้โดยการยื่นคำร้องขอประกันค่าสินไหมทดแทนจากอุบัติเหตุทางอุตสาหกรรมกับฝ่ายบริการชดเชยและสวัสดิการคนงานของเกาหลี หากนายจ้างของคุณไม่ให้ความร่วมมือหรือออกค่าใช้จ่ายในการรักษาในระหว่างกระบวนการนี้ คุณสามารถรายงานเรื่องนี้ต่อฝ่ายบริการชดเชยและสวัสดิการแรงงานของเกาหลี และดำเนินการได้ แรงงานต่างด้าวหรือผู้อพยพสามารถรับความช่วยเหลือได้ที่ศูนย์สนับสนุนแรงงานต่างด้าว และยังสามารถรับคำปรึกษาและความช่วยเหลือผ่านศูนย์บริการลูกค้ากระทรวงการจ้างงานและแรงงาน (1350) หรือสำนักงานแรงงานที่ใกล้ที่สุด

user-question: Xodimlar qonuniy ravishda maxsus ta'til uchun qanday imtiyozlarni talab qilishlari mumkin?
assistant-response: Xodimlar maxsus ta'tildan foydalanganda haqli ravishda quyidagi imtiyozlarni talab qilishlari mumkin: Misol uchun, nikoh, dafn marosimi, tug'ish va hokazo kabi sabablarga ko'ra maxsus ta'til Mehnat me'yorlari to'g'risidagi qonun bilan kafolatlanishi mumkin va agar bu qo'llanilsa, davr mobaynida ish haqi to'lanishi yoki to'lanmasligi individual mehnat shartnomasiga qarab farq qilishi mumkin. yoki kompaniyaning mehnat qoidalari. Biroq, homiladorlik va tug'ish ta'tilida 90 kunlik homiladorlik va tug'ish ta'tillari qonuniy ravishda kafolatlanadi va bu davrda 100% muntazam ish haqi to'lanishi mumkin. Maxsus ta'tilga oid aniqroq ma'lumotlarni Bandlik va mehnat vazirligining maslahat markazi (1350) yoki har bir mahalliy mehnat idorasi orqali olishingiz mumkin, shuningdek, Koreya kasaba uyushmalari federatsiyasi yoki xorijiy ishchilarni qo'llab-quvvatlash markazi kabi tashkilotlardan yordam olishingiz mumkin.

user-question: В каких случаях компания была наказана по закону за отказ в улучшении условий труда?
assistant-response: В Корее случаи, когда компании, отказывающиеся от просьб улучшить условия труда, могут быть наказаны по закону, в основном связаны с нарушениями Закона о безопасности и гигиене труда. Согласно этому закону, работодатели обязаны принимать необходимые меры для защиты безопасности и здоровья своих работников. Если компания нарушает это правило и без уважительной причины отказывает в просьбе улучшить условия труда, создавая тем самым угрозу безопасности и здоровью работников, компания может быть подвергнута штрафу или уголовному наказанию. Например, если будет установлено, что компания не выполнила свои юридические обязательства в случае серьезного инцидента, связанного с безопасностью, виновные могут быть оштрафованы или подвергнуты тюремному заключению. Если у вас возникли проблемы с рабочей средой, вы можете обратиться за помощью в Корейское агентство по безопасности и гигиене труда (KOSHA) или в Министерство занятости и труда. Эти организации обеспечивают проверки безопасности, юридические консультации и, при необходимости, рекомендации по юридическим действиям.

user-question: Как я могу реагировать, если указанные в договоре социальные льготы фактически не предоставляются?
assistant-response: Если льготы, указанные в вашем контракте, на самом деле не предоставляются, вы можете сначала попробовать поговорить напрямую со своим работодателем, чтобы решить проблему. Если проблема не решена, можно подать жалобу в Министерство занятости и труда. Министерство занятости и труда выступает посредником в спорах между работниками и работодателями и защищает их законные права. Жалобу можно подать, посетив сайт Министерства занятости и труда или ближайший центр занятости. Важно подготовить достаточные доказательства (копия контракта, соответствующие электронные письма и т. д.). Помимо Министерства занятости и труда, вы можете получить помощь от таких организаций, как Корейский центр поддержки иностранных рабочих. Эти организации оказывают различную помощь, связанную с защитой прав иностранных работников.

user-question: หลักเกณฑ์ในการรับเงินชดเชยค่ารักษาพยาบาลจากบริษัทขณะลาป่วยมีหลักเกณฑ์อย่างไร?
